mainText:
How I wish I had reached out to you earlier...
All of us here want to extend our deepest condolences to the entire Apple
family over the loss of Steve Jobs.
Not only was Steve a visionary, but someone I've been inspired by -- a
virtual mentor, so to speak.
Our company launched two years ago
and has iPods that are literally powering our business.
Thanks to all of you for creating such terrific products that enable even
the littlest companies to appear bigger than we actually are.
May Steve rest in peace.
author: Ravi
